00039 #ifndef PTR_H_
00040 #define PTR_H_
00041 
00042 template <class T>  
00043 class Ptr 
00044 {
00045 public:
00046     Ptr( T* realPointer = 0 );
00047     Ptr( const Ptr& rhs );
00048     ~Ptr();
00049     Ptr& operator=( const Ptr<T>& rhs );
00050     Ptr& operator=( const T*& realPointer );
00051     T* operator->() const;
00052     T& operator*() const;
00053     operator bool() const { return m_realPointer != NULL; }
00054         void ShowCount() const;
00055         
00056 private:
00057         void Init();
00058         T* m_realPointer;
00059 };
00060 
00061 template <class T>
00062 Ptr<T>::Ptr( T* realPointer )
00063 : m_realPointer(realPointer)
00064 {
00065         Init();
00066 }
00067 
00068 template <class T>
00069 Ptr<T>::Ptr( const Ptr& rhs )
00070 : m_realPointer(rhs.m_realPointer)
00071 {
00072         Init();
00073 }
00074 
00075 template <class T>
00076 void Ptr<T>::Init()
00077 {
00078         if( m_realPointer ) m_realPointer->Upcount();
00079         return;
00080 }
00081 
00082 template <class T>
00083 Ptr<T>::~Ptr()
00084 {
00085         if( m_realPointer ) m_realPointer->Downcount(); 
00086 }
00087 
00088 template <class T>
00089 Ptr<T>& Ptr<T>::operator=( const Ptr<T>& rhs )
00090 {
00091         if( m_realPointer != rhs.m_realPointer )
00092         {
00093                 T* oldRealPointer = m_realPointer;
00094                 m_realPointer = rhs.m_realPointer;
00095                 Init();
00096                 if( oldRealPointer ) oldRealPointer->Downcount();
00097         }
00098         return *this;
00099 }
00100 
00101 template <class T>
00102 Ptr<T>& Ptr<T>::operator=( const T*& realPointer )
00103 {
00104         if( m_realPointer != realPointer )
00105         {
00106                 T* oldRealPointer = m_realPointer;
00107                 m_realPointer = realPointer;
00108                 Init();
00109                 if( oldRealPointer ) oldRealPointer->Downcount();
00110         }
00111         return *this;
00112 }
00113 
00114 template <class T>
00115 T* Ptr<T>::operator->() const
00116 {
00117         return m_realPointer;
00118 }
00119 
00120 template <class T>
00121 T& Ptr<T>::operator*() const
00122 {
00123         return *m_realPointer;
00124 }
00125 
00126 template <class T>
00127 void Ptr<T>::ShowCount() const
00128 { 
00129         m_realPointer->PrintCount();
00130 }
00131 
00132 #endif /*PTR_H_*/
